amendatorysection.catchline: Conviction more than twice; continue business dealing in obscene work or conduct; effect.
amendatorysection.para: Any person who is convicted more than twice under sections 28-807 to 28-829 and continues to use, occupy, establish or conduct a business selling, distributing, disseminating, or exhibiting any obscene work, material, conduct or live performance shall be deemed to be maintaining a nuisance and shall be enjoined as provided for in sections 28-807 to 28-829.
